summary: Diff implements canister-side deletion via a new `deleteCallerUserData()` shared method with existing permission checks, and adds an `AuthenticatedHeader` component exposing in-app Logout and Delete Account actions. Logout clears Internet Identity session (`useInternetIdentity().clear()`), clears onboarding/localStorage cache keys via `clearSweetStepsSession()`, clears React Query cache, and navigates to `/`. Delete Account confirms (via AlertDialog components), calls backend deletion, then performs the same clear/reset and navigation; on failure it shows an English error message.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any new routes; scope is limited to in-app Logout/Delete Account flows.

hallucinated_features.description: Clears TanStack React Query cache during Logout/Delete Account (`queryClient.clear()`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires clearing Internet Identity session and specific SweetSteps persisted state (OnboardingResultContext storage and localStorage keys), but does not mention React Query cache management.
